com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.util

Class ThemeUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.util.ThemeUtil

  • public final class ThemeUtil
extends Object
    Static support classes for retrieving the theme version.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Martin Shevchenko

    • Method Detail

      • getThemeName

        public static String getThemeName()
        Returns:
        the current theme name

      • getThemeBuild

        public static String getThemeBuild()
        Returns:
        the current theme build

      • getThemeXslt

        public static String getThemeXslt(UIContext uic)

        Retrieves the complete path to the theme's XSLT. This method takes the current theme and user's locale into account.

        Note: The XSLT is the single integration point to the client-side rendering.

        Parameters:
        uic - the current user's UIContext.
        Returns:
        the theme XSLT.

      • getThemeXsltName

        public static String getThemeXsltName(UIContext uic)
        Get the name of the XSLT file to use taking locale and debug mode into consideration.
        Parameters:
        uic - The UIContext to use to determine factors such as locale.
        Returns:
        The name of the XSLT file without any path or cachebuster.
